long_description: A roll-top closure on the ultralight Boreas Topaz 18 Pack makes carrying your gear nice and simple. It's great for hiking, cycling, all-day festivals and shopping at the farmers market. Durable ripstop nylon pack with a high-density foam back. Easy-access roll top with sturdy clip; internal zippered storage pocket. Hydration compatible (reservoir not included) with top access hose port. Hidden daisy chain with accessory loop. 18-liter capacity is enough room for a water bottle, lunch, lightweight jacket or big bag of locally grown produce. The Boreas Topaz 18 Pack weighs only 10.4 oz.
short_description: A roll-top closure on the ultralight Boreas Topaz 18 Pack makes carrying your gear nice and simple. It's great for hiking, cycling, all-day festivals and shopping at the farmers market.
